name: student-risk-system
description: Student Risk Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
